content.rendered:
Dan Bilzerian is a terrorist sympathizer who uses his platform to spew venomous rhetoric against Israel and Jews. This man, who built his fame flaunting wealth and exploiting women, now spends his time glorifying Hamas—a terrorist organization responsible for the brutal massacre of over 1,400 innocent Israeli civilians on October 7, 2023. Calling these murderers “freedom fighters” is not just ignorant; it’s a deliberate endorsement of violence and terror. His words are a slap in the face to every victim of Hamas’ barbarity.

Bilzerian’s antisemitism runs rampant as he spreads grotesque conspiracy theories blaming Jews and Israel for everything from the assassination of JFK to controlling global media and governments. He pushes the same tired, hateful lies used by bigots for centuries to justify violence against Jewish communities. Worse yet, he doesn’t stop at propaganda—he openly denies the Holocaust, claiming the systematic extermination of six million Jews didn’t happen as history has documented. This is Holocaust denial at its most vile, spitting on the graves of victims and survivors alike.

His platform amplifies his dangerous ideologies to millions of followers, legitimizing hatred and fueling division. By calling for the destruction of Israel and elevating Hamas leaders to “heroic” status, Bilzerian has crossed every possible line. He is not a misinformed celebrity but an active participant in spreading terrorist propaganda and antisemitism. His grotesque claims about “Jewish supremacy” being the world’s biggest threat are not only delusional but deeply hateful, emboldening the same ideologies that lead to violence against Jews around the world.

Dan Bilzerian is not just a toxic influencer; he’s a menace. His transition from a social media clown to a terrorist apologist exposes the depravity of his character. No amount of his wealth or fame can sanitize his disgraceful support for murderers and his vile attacks on an entire people. Those who stand with Bilzerian stand with terror, antisemitism, and hate, plain and simple.
